review: What the heck!!  This is not the product pictured!  This product is not even big enough to hold a laptop.  I had the product pictured and it broke, figured I would order a new.  THIS IS NOT THE SAME PRODUCT!  Whoever sold this is using a picture of a better product and sending out a "travel dining tray" instead.  Horrible way to do business, ADVERTISING SOMETHING THAT IT IS NOT IS A CRIME.  REQUESTING REFUND.
productTitle: Car Auto laptop Tablet PC iPad Mount Stand Holder Desk Table Drink Food Cup Tray
